summary: MY 2001 HYUNDAI XG350L WAS INVOLVED IN A SIDE ACCIDENT AND THE SIDE AIRBAG DID NOT DEPLOY.  THIS CAR HAD BEEN TO THE DEALER MONTHS AGO SUBJECT TO A RECALL TO FIX SOMETHING DEFECTIVE ON THE SIDE AIR BAG.  I HAVE FOUND NO WAY TO SEND THIS INFORMATION TO HYUNDAI ON THEIR WEBSITE.          *JB
